# Credit :: Outils de calculs pour prêts immobiliers
Definition du modèle:
```
{
  "loans": [
    {
      "name": "PTZ+",
      "principal": 2500,
      "start_date": "2011-01-01",
      "series": [
        {"start":   1, "end": 23, "amount": 104.79, "rate": 0.00 },
        {"start":   24, "end": 24, "amount": 104.95, "rate": 0.00 }
       
      ],
      "insurances": [
        {"start": 1, "end": 24, "principal": 2500, "rate": 0.003 }
      ]
    }
  ]
}
```
Calcul d'amortissement:
```
loans.printAmo();
```

Calculs crédits multiples et lissage

```
{
  "loans": [
    {
      "name": "PRET1",
      "principal": 2500,
      "start_date": "2011-01-01",
      "series": [
        {"start":   1, "end": 24, "amount": 10, "rate": 0.00 }
      ],
      "insurances": [
        {"start": 1, "end": 24, "principal": 2500, "rate": 0.003 }
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "PRET2",
      "principal": 30000,
      "start_date": "2011-01-01",
      "series": [
        { "start": 1, "end": 120, "amount": 297.18, "rate": 0.03}
      ],
      "insurances": [
        { "start": 1, "end": 120, "principal": 30000, "rate": 0.003 }
      ],
      "strategies":[
     
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "PRET3",
      "principal": 40000,
      "start_date": "2011-01-01",
      "series": [
        { "start":   1, "end":  1, "amount": 200, "rate": 0.04 }
        
      ],
      "insurances": [
        { "start": 1, "end": 168, "principal": 40000, "rate": 0.004 }
      ],
      "strategies":[
      	{ "name" : "split",  "split_after" : 1 },
      	{ "name" : "smoothing", "target" : 500, "rate" : 0.040, "insurance_rate" : "0.004"}
      ]
    }
  ]
}
```
